headline: Carrier Japan's Universal Smart X Heat Pump Recognized by WIPO as Leading Energy Solution in Special Edition of Green Technology Book
summary: Carrier Japan's air-cooled modular chiller / heat pump Universal Smart X (USX) series has been included in the EXPO 2025 Special Edition of the Green Technology Book. Published by World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO), the prestigious recognition was unveiled at EXPO 2025 Osaka, showcasing over 200 impactful energy innovations from the Asia Pacific region and highlighting technologies that contribute to a more sustainable future. headline: Saudi Arabia White Goods Forecast Report 2025: A $8.44 Billion Market by 2034 as LG Electronics, Carrier Global, and Midea Group Advance with M&A, Investments, and Expansion Strategies
summary: Key market opportunities in Saudi Arabia's white goods sector include the expansion of local manufacturing backed by government initiatives, increased demand driven by rising disposable incomes, and the burgeoning e-commerce sector.
